TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DereferenceAlias extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The DereferenceAlias enumeration specifies how aliases are resolved. This enumeration provides values for the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.DerefAlias%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.DereferenceAlias Always = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Dereferences aliases when both searching subordinates and locating the base objects of the search.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.DereferenceAlias FindingBaseObject = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Dereferences aliases when locating the base object of the search, but not when searching its subordinates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.DereferenceAlias InSearching = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Dereferences aliases when searching subordinates of the base object, but not when locating the base itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.DereferenceAlias Never = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the alias will not be dereferenced. If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.DerefAlias%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not set, the default value is Never.
